description:
doc: Add important info for would-be go contributors.

Link to the "installing from source" docs instead of the "installing" docs.

Remind would-be hacker to switch to the default branch from the release branch.

doc: add important info for would-be go contributors.

Link to the "installing from source" docs instead of the "installing" docs.

Remind would-be hacker to switch to the default branch from the release branch.
